headline: A Look At Caesars Entertainment (CZR) Valuation As Lake Tahoe Overhaul Targets Higher Resort Appeal
summary: Caesars Entertainment (CZR) has kicked off Phase Two of its US$200 million overhaul of Caesars Republic Lake Tahoe, expanding resort amenities, meetings space and bar concepts in partnership with Clique Hospitality. See our latest analysis for Caesars Entertainment. Against this backdrop of Lake Tahoe investment, Caesars Entertainment’s share price closed at US$21.95 after a 1 day share price return of 6.76%, yet the 1 year total shareholder return of 39.55% and 5 year total shareholder...
